vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
BNBJoin.exit (join.sol#176-180) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- usr.transfer(wad) (join.sol#179)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: GemLike.decimals (join.sol#69) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in join.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (join.sol#16): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (join.sol#66): it allows old versions
